name: Dice Kingdom
description:
PLAYABLE ON BROWSER, RECOMENDED TO DOWNLOAD FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE

GMTK 2022 Jam game, theme Roll of the dice.

This game is kingdom builder only using dice roll and resource tracking as mechanics. Most simulator type city/kingdom builders are just tons of dice rolls and resources moving around controlled by games mechanics and player. In this game only interaction player has is what dice you buy. Technically this game could be replicated quite easily with just tons dice, paper and pen. Goal creating  this game was to take this to more extreme scale. Difficulty  is high on purpose so players need to thing their purchases more and build stable economy to avoid death spirals to ruin.

Controls:

Space to roll!

Dice build buttons have their key binds (1,2,3,Q, etc) 

Z: toggle upkeep/cost

Shift: build 5x at time

No key rebinding.
